name: Nivea Soothing Micellair Water
composition: Ingredients: Aqua, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycine, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Panthenol, Pantolactone, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Decyl Glucoside, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Propylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Poloxamer 124, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-10, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, BHT
